name: EVA Hotmelt A1289
description: EVA Hotmelt A1289 is adhesives are natural products and may vary slightly in color. the adhesive is clear transparent and has good adhesion to many materials, such as wood, wood-based materials, paper, cardboard, textiles, glass, ceramic and plastics such as melamine, ps, pvc, pmma, pc and pu foam. the raw materials used comply with fda guideline 175.105 for the outer packaging of food products.
